Return Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

Return Eligibility

Your purchase is eligible for a return if it meets the following criteria: the product must be returned in its original packaging (used or unused), reach the specified address listed on our website, and arrive within 15 days of the purchase date. Damaged products will not be accepted.

Refund Process

To process a refund, customers must initiate the return process and send the product to the specified address. Once the product is received and inspected, refunds will be credited to the original payment method within 10 business days, excluding shipping costs.

Shipping Responsibility

The return process is customer-initiated, and customers are responsible for ensuring the product is shipped to the specified address. Return shipping costs are not covered unless the return is due to a manufacturing defect or error.

For any return inquiries, please contact us at info@sampoornaarogya.com
